    </small>

## Description

[Intercom](https://intercom.com) is a tool purpose-built for sales, marketing, and support to use together.

## Connections

### Intercom

To connect to Intercom you will need to create a new app in their [Developer Hub](https://developers.intercom.com/).

Click "New App" and select "Public app" (you can use "Internal integration" if you do not need to connect to customer Intercom workspaces).

To enable OAuth you need to navigate to "Authentication", click the "Edit" button, and check "Use OAuth". Click "Add redirect URL" and enter Composer's callback URL: https<!---->://oauth2.prismatic.io/callback

You can also use this opportunity to reduce the selected Permissions (scopes) if desired. Once complete, click "Save".

Next, collect the **Client ID** and **Client secret** from the "Basic information" page.

You are now ready to create the OAuth 2.0 connection to Intercom within Composer:

- Enter the **Client ID** and **Client secret** values into the same named fields.

Save your integration and you should now be able to authenticate to Intercom.

Note that you will need to submit your Intercom app for review when it is ready for production.

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      shown: false,
      comments: "Authorization URL for Intercom",
      key: "authorizeUrl",
      type: "string",
      default: "https://app.intercom.com/oauth",
      label: "Authorize URL",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Client ID of your Intercom app",
      key: "clientId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Client ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Client Secret of your Intercom app",
      key: "clientSecret",
      type: "password",
      default: "",
      label: "Client Secret",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      shown: false,
      comments: "Space delimited scopes",
      key: "scopes",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Scopes",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      shown: false,
      comments: "Token URL for Intercom",
      key: "tokenUrl",
      type: "string",
      default: "https://api.intercom.io/auth/eagle/token",
      label: "Token URL",
    },
  ]}
/>

### Archive Contact

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      comments: "Unique identifier for the entity given by Intercom",
      key: "id",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "ID",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "id": "5ba682d23d7cf92bef87bfd4",
    "object": "contact",
    "archived": true
  }
}
```

```
    "size": 85,

    "session_count": 26,
    "user_count": 10,

      "paid_subscriber": true,
```

  ]}
/>

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="unarchivecontact" />

### Unarchive Contact

Unarchive an archived Contact | <small><b>key: unarchiveContact</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      comments: "Unique identifier for the entity given by Intercom",
      key: "id",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "ID",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "id": "5ba682d23d7cf92bef87bfd4",
    "object": "contact",
    "archived": false
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="updatecompany" />

### Update Company

Update an existing Company | <small><b>key: updateCompany</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Company ID you have defined for the company",
      key: "company_id",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Company ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      comments: "The industry this company operates in",
      key: "industry",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Industry",
    },
    {
      comments: "How much revenue the company generates for your business",
      key: "monthly_spend",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Monthly Spend",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments: "Name of the company",
      key: "name",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Name",
    },
    {
      comments: "Name of the plan associated with the company",
      key: "plan",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Plan",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments: "Time the company was created by you",
      key: "remote_created_at",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Remote Created At",
    },
    {
      comments: "Number of employees in this company",
      key: "size",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Size",
    },
    {
      comments: "The URL for this company's website",
      key: "website",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Website",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "type": "company",
    "id": "531ee472cce572a6ec000006",
    "name": "Blue Sun",
    "plan": "plan1",
    "company_id": "6",
    "remote_created_at": 1394531169,
    "created_at": 1394533506,
    "updated_at": 1396874658,
    "size": 85,
    "website": "http://www.example.com",
    "industry": "Manufacturing",
    "monthly_spend": 49,
    "session_count": 26,
    "user_count": 10,
    "custom_attributes": {
      "paid_subscriber": true,
      "team_mates": 0
    }
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="updatecontact" />

### Update Contact

Update an existing Contact | <small><b>key: updateContact</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      comments: "An image URL containing the avatar of a contact",
      key: "avatar",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Avatar URL",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Email of the contact",
      key: "email",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Email",
    },
    {
      comments: "Unique identifier for the entity from external systems",
      key: "external_id",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "External ID",
    },
    {
      comments: "Unique identifier for the entity given by Intercom",
      key: "id",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "ID",
    },
    {
      comments: "The time when the contact was last seen",
      key: "last_seen_at",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Last Seen At",
    },
    {
      comments: "Name of the contact",
      key: "name",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Name",
    },
    {
      comments: "Phone of the contact",
      key: "phone",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Phone",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      model: [
        {
          label: "User",
          value: "user",
        },
        {
          label: "Lead",
          value: "lead",
        },
      ],
      comments: "The role of the contact",
      key: "role",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Role",
    },
    {
      comments: "The time specified for when a contact signed up",
      key: "signed_up_at",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Signed Up At",
    },
    {
      comments: "Whether the contact is unsubscribed from emails",
      key: "unsubscribed_from_emails",
      type: "boolean",
      default: "false",
      label: "Unsubscribed From Emails",
    },
  ]}
/>

```
{
```

<div id="updatetag" />

### Update Tag

Update an existing Tag | <small><b>key: updateTag</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "ID of the tag",
      key: "id",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Name of the tag",
      key: "name",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Name",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "id": "17513",
    "name": "independent",
    "type": "tag"
  }
}
```
